replies.body: Any idea as to when the Star Guardian skins will be purchasable? {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
September 8th =D "7.17’s gonna be a longer patch than usual, so tack some extra days onto your expectations around the usual “during this patch”-esque comments below."
the same amount of time after a patch, as every other new skin. why do people keep asking this?
because these are the only skins ive every been excited enough for to count the weeks between a patch and release?
It'll probably available in  a few days.
Will PAX Sivir owners receive the vintage summoner icon as well?
Is Rengar going to get a new skin  soon
